selftimer: 10 sec, 2 sec. delay, Group Timer, Couple Timer
focusdistance: 60 cm to infinity / 2.0 ft to infinity(Wide), 1.0m to infinity / 3.3 ft to infinity (Telephoto)
focallength: f=5.0 – 25.0 mm, equivalent to 28 – 140 mm on a 35 mm camera
shutterspeed: (Auto Mode) 1/4 sec. to 1/2000 sec., (All other modes) 4 sec. to 1/2000 seconds
